mapper.update: update t_user set zn_name=#{znName}, email=#{email}, telphone=#{telphone}, where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select tu.user_id as userId, tu.account as account, tu.zn_name as znName, tu.email as email, tu.telphone as telphone, tu.create_time as createTime, tr.role_id as roleId, tr.role_name as roleName, tg.group_id as groupId, tg.group_name as groupName from t_user as tu left join t_user_role as tur on tu.user_id = tur.user_id left join t_role as tr on tur.role_id = tr.role_id left join t_user_group as tug on tu.user_id = tug.user_id left join t_group as tg on tug.group_id = tg.group_id where tu.account = #{account}

select tur.user_id as userId, tur.role_id as roleId, tug.group_id as groupId, tu.zn_name as znName, tr.role_name as roleName, tg.group_name as groupName, date_format(tu.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime, tu.group_desc as groupDesc from t_user_role as tur left join t_user as tu on tur.user_id = tu.user_id left join t_user_group as tug on tur.user_id = tug.user_id left join t_role as tr on tur.role_id = tr.role_id left join t_group as tg on tug.group_id = tg.group_id
select tr.role_id as roleId, tr.role_name as roleName from t_role as tr
select tg.group_id as groupId, tg.group_name as groupName from t_group as tg

select tu.user_id as userId, tu.account as account, tu.passcode as passcode, tu.zn_name as znName, tu.email as email, tu.telphone as telphone, tu.create_time as createTime, tr.role_id as roleId, tr.role_name as roleName, tg.group_id as groupId, tg.group_name as groupName from t_user as tu left join t_user_group as tug on tu.user_id = tug.user_id left join t_user_role as tur on tu.user_id = tur.user_id left join t_group as tg on tug.group_id = tg.group_id left join t_role as tr on tur.role_id = tr.role_id where tu.account = #{account};
select tu.email as email from t_user as tu where tu.user_id= #{userId}
select user_id as userId, account as account, passcode as passcode, zn_name as znName, email as email from t_user where email = #{email} and account=#{account}
